page.title: 03Norwell and Cromwell's Shops
page.content: There is just 1{shop,}at{Norwell, } and we decided to see what articles from a week's shopping would cost. (1) Baked Beans (450g).........Â£0.29 (2) 1 dozen eggs (standard)....Â£0.88 (3) Sugar (1kg)................Â£0.47 (4) Bacon (1 lb)...............Â£1.92 (5) Cheddar Cheese (1 lb)......Â£1.20 (6) Corn Flakes (500g).........Â£0.89 (7) Jar of Jam (454g)..........Â£0.50 (8) Orange Squash (1 litre)....Â£0.62 (9) Orange Juice (1 litre).....Â£0.65 (10) Pack of 8 Sausages........Â£1.05 (11) 10 Fish Fingers...........Â£0.94 (12) Apples (1 lb).............Â£0.30 (13) Potatoes (5 lb)...........Â£0.30 (14) Butter (250g).............Â£0.56 (15) Margerine (250g)..........Â£0.42 (16) Tea (125g)................Â£0.59 (17) Coffee (100g).............Â£1.59 (18) Milk (1 pint).............Â£0.23 (19) Frozen Peas (500g)........Â£0.70
